Kapolri: Semoga Sinergi Polri dan KPK Semakin Kuat
04 Nov 2019, 15:41 by Eko Sulestyono



Kapolri: Semoga Sinergi Polri dan KPK Semakin Kuat



Kapolri: Semoga Sinergi Polri dan KPK Semakin Kuat


KBRN, Jakarta : Ketua Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK) Agus Rahardjo hari ini menerima kunjungan Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Azis. Pertemuan kedua pimpinan lembaga penegak hukum itu berlangsung di Gedung KPK Merah Putih, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Kuningan, Jakarta Selatan.
Saat menggelar acara jumpa pers, Kapolri Idham Aziz ingin agar hubungan atau sinergi antara Polri dengan KPK semakin kuat atau solid. Menurut Idham Aziz, sinergi dilakukan dengan cara memperkuat kerja sama, terutama terkait program-program pencegahan hingga penindakan kasus dugaan Tindak Pidana Korupsi (Tipikor). 
"Kita tentu berharap benar-benar institusi Polri dan KPK ini bisa bergandengan tangan, sehingga bisa bersama-sama dalam  membangun integritas yang positif di dalam rangka penegakan dan pencegahan masalah tindak pidana korupsi, saya kira itu ada hal-hal yang esensial selain tadi bersilaturahmi sama beliau," kata Idham Aziz di Jakarta, Senin (4/11/2019).
Idham Azis dalam kesempatan ini juga menegaskan bahwa sebenarnya pertemuan antara dirinya dengan dengan Pimpinan KPK sebelumnya sudah beberapa kali dilakukan. Saat itu Idham Aziz diketahui masih menjabat sebagai Kapolda Metro Jaya dan maupun sebagai Kabareskrim Polri.
"Sehingga, sebagai pejabat baru (Kapolri) saya datang sowan dan bersilaturahmi sama beliau (Ketua KPK) sekaligus memohon arahan," kata Kapolri Jenderal Polisi Idham Aziz.
Sementara itu, Ketua KPK Agus Rahardjo juga berharap agar pertemuan antara pimpinan KPK dengan Kapolri juga memperkuat kerja sama KPK dan Polri.
“Menghasilkan hal-hal yang terbaik bagi bangsa dan negara kita," kata Ketua KPK Agus Rahardjo kepada wartawan di Jakarta.
Dalam kesempatan ini, Kadiv Humas Polri Irjen M Iqbal menegaskan kunjungan Kapolri ke KPK menunjukan dukungan penuh Polri ke KPK. Dalam pertemuan, Kapolri disebut Iqbal juga mendengarkan saran dan harapan dari pimpinan KPK. 
"Yang jelas masa depan pemberantasan korupsi show must be go on sekuat-kuatnya dan teman teman publik harus paham Bapak Kapolri Jumat (1/11) kemarin dilantik presiden, yang pertama dikunjungi Bapak Panglima TNI dan kedua, Ketua KPK. Ini menunjukkan pesan beliau sangat ingin mensupport KPK secara kelembagaan, ini harus digaris bawahi," pungkas M. Iqbal.

Chief of Police: Hopefully the Synergy of the Police and KPK Is Stronger
04 Nov 2019, 15:41 by Eko Sulestyono



Chief of Police: Hopefully the Synergy of the Police and KPK Is Stronger



Chief of Police: Hopefully the Synergy of the Police and KPK Is Stronger


KBRN, Jakarta: Chairman of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK) Agus Rahardjo today received a visit from the National Police Chief, Police General Idham Azis. The second meeting of the leadership of the law enforcement agency took place at the Red and White KPK Building, Jalan Kuningan Persada, Kuningan, South Jakarta.
When holding a press conference, National Police Chief Idham Aziz wanted the relationship or synergy between the National Police and the Corruption Eradication Commission to be stronger or solid. According to Idham Aziz, the synergy is carried out by strengthening cooperation, especially in relation to prevention programs to the enforcement of cases of suspected Corruption (Tipikor).
"We certainly hope that this Polri and KPK institution can join hands, so that they can work together in building positive integrity in the context of upholding and preventing corruption, I think there are essential things besides having friendly relations. he, "said Idham Aziz in Jakarta, Monday (11/04/2019).
Idham Azis on this occasion also emphasized that in fact the meeting between him and the KPK leadership had previously been conducted several times. At that time Idham Aziz was known to be still serving as the Head of Metro Jaya Police and as well as the Police Criminal Investigation.
"So, as a new official (Kapolri) I came along and made friends with him (KPK Chairperson) at the same time asking for directions," said National Police Chief Police General Idham Aziz.
Meanwhile, KPK Chairman Agus Rahardjo also hoped that the meeting between KPK leaders and the National Police Chief also strengthened the cooperation between the KPK and the National Police.
"Producing the best things for our nation and country," KPK Chairman Agus Rahardjo told reporters in Jakarta.
On this occasion, the Police Public Relations Head of Inspector General M Iqbal confirmed the visit of the National Police Chief to the KPK showed Polri's full support to the KPK. During the meeting, the National Police Chief called Iqbal also listened to suggestions and hopes from the KPK leadership.
"What is clear is that the future of the eradication of corruption shows must be go as strong as possible and friends of the public must understand Mr Kapolri on Friday (1/11) yesterday was inaugurated by the president, the first was visited by the Commander in Chief of the TNI and the second, the Chairperson of the KPK. This shows his message very "I want to support the KPK institutionally, it must be underlined," concluded M. Iqbal.
